docker.registry.[ID.]credentials.name: Docker Registry Credentials CPS Property
docker.registry.[ID.]credentials.description: Provides the credentials of a Docker Registry that is used by the Docker Manager

docker.engine.port.name: Docker Engine Port CPS Property
docker.engine.port.description: Provides TCP Port of the Docker Engine

docker.default.registries.name: Default Docker Registries CPS Property
docker.default.registries.description: An ordered list of Docker Registries IDs to search for Images requested by Galasa Tests

docker.registry.ID.url.name: Docker Registry URL CPS Property
docker.registry.ID.url.description: Provides the URL of a Docker Registry that is used by the Docker Manager.

docker.engine.[engineId].hostname.name: Docker Engine CPS Property
docker.engine.[engineId].hostname.description: Provides location of the Docker Engine

kubernetes.cluster.XXXX.nodeport.proxy.h.name: Kubernetes Node Port Proxy Hostname CPS Property
kubernetes.cluster.XXXX.nodeport.proxy.h.description: Provides the hostname that NodePorts can be accessed on.

kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]max.slots.name: Maximum Slots on Cluster CPS Property
kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]max.slots.description: Specifies the maximum number of slots(namespaces) that can be allocated at one time on the cluster

kubernetes.namespace.tag.XXXXXX.shared.e.name: Kubernetes Tag Shared Environment
kubernetes.namespace.tag.XXXXXX.shared.e.description: Tells the Kubernetes Manager which Shared Environment is assigned to a namespace tag

kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]credentials.name: Kubernetes Cluster Credentials CPS Property
kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]credentials.description: Provides the Credentials ID for the token required to access the Kubernetes cluster

kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]override.stora.name: Kubernetes Override Storage Class CPS Property
kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]override.stora.description: Provides a Kubernetes StorageClass that is set on all PersistentVolumeClaims that are created in the Kubernetes namespace.   The value of this property is set in the property *spec.storageClassName*

kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]validate.certi.name: Kubernetes Validate Cluster Certificate CPS Property
kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]validate.certi.description: Validates the Kubernetes Cluster API Certificate

kubernetes.cluster.ids.name: Kubernetes Cluster IDs CPS Property
kubernetes.cluster.ids.description: Provides a comma separated list of the active Kubernetes Clusters that are defined in the CPS

kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]namespaces.name: Kubernetes Namespace IDs CPS Property
kubernetes.cluster.[XXXX.]namespaces.description: Provides a comma separated list of the namespaces that are available on the cluster

kubernetes.cluster.XXXX.url.name: Kubernetes Cluster API URL CPS Property
kubernetes.cluster.XXXX.url.description: The API URL of the Kubernetes Cluster

zos.bundle.extra.tsocommand.manager.name: Extra bundle to required to implement the zOS TSO Command Manager
zos.bundle.extra.tsocommand.manager.description: The name of the Bundle that implements the zOS TSO Command Manager

zos.bundle.extra.file.manager.name: Extra bundle to required to implement the zOS File Manager
zos.bundle.extra.file.manager.description: The name of the Bundle that implements the zOS File Manager

zos.bundle.extra.unixcomand.manager.name: Extra bundle to required to implement the zOS UNIX Command Manager
zos.bundle.extra.unixcomand.manager.description: The name of the Bundle that implements the zOS UNIX Command Manager

zos.cluster.[clusterId].images.name: The images for a zOS Cluster
zos.cluster.[clusterId].images.description: The zOS Images for the specifies Cluster

zos.dse.tag.[tag].imageid.name: The zOS Image
zos.dse.tag.[tag].imageid.description: The image ID for the specified tag

zos.bundle.extra.batch.manager.name: Extra bundle to required to implement the zOS Batch Manager
zos.bundle.extra.batch.manager.description: The name of the Bundle that implements the zOS Batch Manager

zos.image.[tag].max.slots.name: Maximum slots for zOS Image
zos.image.[tag].max.slots.description: The maximum slots available on a zOS Image for the specified tag

zos.run.[image].dataset.hlq.name: The run data set HLQ for the zOS Image
zos.run.[image].dataset.hlq.description:
The data set HLQ(s) for temporary data sets created on zOS Image.
If CPS property zos.run.[image].dataset.hlq exists, then that is returned

zos.dse.tag.[tag].clusterid.name: Developer Supplied Environment zOS Image Cluster ID
zos.dse.tag.[tag].clusterid.description: The Cluster ID for the specified tag

zos.bundle.extra.console.manager.name: Extra bundle to required to implement the zOS Console Manager
zos.bundle.extra.console.manager.description: The name of the Bundle that implements the zOS Console Manager

zos.tag.[tag].clusterid.name: The zOS Cluster ID
zos.tag.[tag].clusterid.description: The zOS Cluster ID for the specified tag

zos.image.[tag].iphostid.name: IP Host ID of the zOS Image
zos.image.[tag].iphostid.description:
The IP Host ID of the zOS Image for the supplied tag.
If CPS property zos.image.[tag].iphostid exists, then that is returned, otherwise the zOS Image ID is returned

zosmf.server.[clusterid].images.name: zOSMF Server images
zosmf.server.[clusterid].images.description: The zOSMF server images active on the supplied cluster

zosbatch.batchjob.[imageid].restrict.to..name: Restrict zOS batch processing to the zOSMF server on the specified image
zosbatch.batchjob.[imageid].restrict.to..description: Use only the zOSMF server running on the image associated with the zOS Batch job

zosbatch.batchjob.[imageid].timeout.name: zOS Batch job execution wait timeout
zosbatch.batchjob.[imageid].timeout.description: The value in seconds to wait for the zOS Batch job execution to complete when submitted via zOSMF

zosbatch.default.[imageid].message.level.name: zOS Batch default message level
zosbatch.default.[imageid].message.level.description: The default message level to set on the job card for submitted jobs

zosbatch.default.[imageid].input.class.name: zOS Batch default input class
zosbatch.default.[imageid].input.class.description: The default input class to set on the job card for submitted jobs

zosbatch.batchjob.[imageid].truncate.jcl.name: zOS Batch job truncate JCL
zosbatch.batchjob.[imageid].truncate.jcl.description: The z/OSMF submit job will fail if supplied with JCL records greater than 80 characters. Setting this property to true will truncate any records to 80 characters and issue a warning message.

zosbatch.jobname.[imageid].prefix.name: zOS Batch jobname prefix
zosbatch.jobname.[imageid].prefix.description: The zOS Batch jobname prefix when submitted via zOSMF

zosbatch.batchjob.[imageid].use.sysaff.name: zOS Batch job use SYSAFF
zosbatch.batchjob.[imageid].use.sysaff.description: Use the run the zOS Batch job on the specified image by specifying {@code /*JOBPARM SYSAFF=[imageid]}

zosconsole.console.[imageid].restrict.to.name: Restrict zOS console processing to the zOSMF server on the specified image
zosconsole.console.[imageid].restrict.to.description: Use only the zOSMF server running on the image associated with the zOS Console

zosfile.[imageid].unix.file.permission.name: UNIX permission bits to be used in creating the file or directory
zosfile.[imageid].unix.file.permission.description: The UNIX file or directory permission bits to be used in creating the file or directory

zosfile.zosmf.[imageid].restrict.to.imag.name: Restrict processing to the zOSMF server on the specified image
zosfile.zosmf.[imageid].restrict.to.imag.description: Use only the zOSMF server running on the image associated with the zOS data set or file

zosfile.unix.[imageid].directory.list.ma.name: The maximum number of items from a directory list
zosfile.unix.[imageid].directory.list.ma.description: The maximum number of items zOSMF returns when listing the content of a directory

elastic.endpoint.index.name: ElasticLog Endpoint Index CPS Property
elastic.endpoint.index.description: Provides the index in elasticsearch to which requests are directed

elastic.local.run.log.name: ElasticLog Endpoint Local Run CPS Property
elastic.local.run.log.description: Activates the ElasticLog Manager for local runs

elastic.endpoint.address.name: ElasticLog Endpoint Address CPS Property
elastic.endpoint.address.description: Provides an address to send elastic requests to

selenium.instance.INSTANCE.gecko.profile.name: Selenium Gecko Profile CPS Property
selenium.instance.INSTANCE.gecko.profile.description: Provides a profile to use when using the gecko driver for extensions

selenium.instance.INSTANCE.browser.path.name: Selenium Driver Path CPS Property
selenium.instance.INSTANCE.browser.path.description: Provides a path to the webdriver on the system being tested

selenium.dse.instance.name.name: Selenium DSE Instance CPS Property
selenium.dse.instance.name.description: Provides a DSE instance for selenium properties

selenium.instance.INSTANCE.web.driver.name: Selenium Driver Type CPS Property
selenium.instance.INSTANCE.web.driver.description: Provides the browser of the webdriver needed for a given instance

galasaecosystem.docker.registry.name: Docker Registry
galasaecosystem.docker.registry.description: The registry that contains the Docker images

galasaecosystem.maven.repository.name: Maven Repository URL
galasaecosystem.maven.repository.description: The location of the Maven Repository all artifacts will be downloaded from

galasaecosystem.maven.version.name: Maven Artifact Version
galasaecosystem.maven.version.description: The versions of the Maven artifacts to be used with the Ecosystem

galasaecosystem.ecosystem.tag.XXXXXX.sha.name: Kubernetes Ecosystem Tag Shared Environment
galasaecosystem.ecosystem.tag.XXXXXX.sha.description: Tells the Galasa Ecosystem Manager which Shared Environment is assigned to an Ecosystem Tag

galasaecosystem.docker.version.name: Docker Image Version
galasaecosystem.docker.version.description: The versions of the Docker images to be used with the Ecosystem
